alert.note: Alert for Greene; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 22 at 10:06PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Choctaw, northwestern Washington, northwestern Clarke, southeastern Wayne and northeastern Greene Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1006 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near State Line, or 16 miles west of Chatom, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Millry, State Line, Buckatunna, Silas, Coffeeville, Gilbertown and Toxey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi.
